channel.title: K-Pop on YJ Blog

item.title: Dive deep to K-pop Singers #1
item.description: While listening to my favorite Korean music today, I decided to write a post about Korean pop. There are many famous K-pop stars and artists out there, but I thought it would be nice to introduce some lesser-known yet amazing singers. Today’s featured singer is Ha Hyun-woo, the frontman of the Korean band Guckkasten. In the band, he serves as the leader, vocalist, and guitarist. One of the greatest songs he performed is “Don’t Cry,” which he sang on the show King of Mask Singer.
